name: Anh Thy
greetingText: This is my little gift for you today
wishText: Hope happiness will come to you <3
textInChatBox: Chúc em 8/3 vui vẻ nhá!! Yeee! Thật nhiều niềm vui và hạnh phúc blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special in my heart
outroText: I hope you enjoy this little gift.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
